EmailTemplate.description: SFDC-4199 Alert feedback creator when oppy feedback status is completed or Rejected
EmailTemplate.name: When Feedback Record Is Completed or Rejected
EmailTemplate.subject: There is an update on your feedback
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Feedback__c.CreatedDate}
Dear {!Feedback__c.CreatedBy},
The status of the feedback has changed to {!Feedback__c.Status__c}. Please click on the link below for details.
Link to Feedback
Kind regards, IHS Markit
